hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated that :the Prophet said: "Whoever combines two prayers without any excuse then he has committed something from the major sins

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْجَمْعِ بَيْنَ الصَّلاَتَيْنِ فِي الْحَضَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Combining Two Prayers While [A Resident]
